topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

CreateFargateProfile.name: CreateFargateProfile
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

CreateNodegroup.name: CreateNodegroup
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

DeleteFargateProfile.name: DeleteFargateProfile
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

DeleteNodegroup.name: DeleteNodegroup
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
DescribeCluster.description: Returns descriptive information about an Amazon EKS cluster.

DescribeFargateProfile.name: DescribeFargateProfile
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
DescribeFargateProfile.description: Returns descriptive information about an AWS Fargate profile associated with a cluster.

DescribeNodegroup.name: DescribeNodegroup
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
DescribeNodegroup.description: Returns descriptive information about an Amazon EKS nodegroup.

DescribeUpdate.name: DescribeUpdate
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
DescribeUpdate.description:
Describes a given update for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup (in the specified
                                                or default region).

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
ListClusters.description: Lists the Amazon EKS clusters in your AWS account (in the specified or default region).

ListFargateProfiles.name: ListFargateProfiles
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
ListFargateProfiles.description:
Lists the AWS Fargate profiles in your AWS account (in the specified or default region)
                                                associated with a given cluster.

ListNodegroups.name: ListNodegroups
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
ListNodegroups.description:
Lists the Amazon EKS nodegroups in your AWS account (in the specified or default region)
                                                attached to given cluster.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
ListTagsForResource.description: List tags for the specified resource.

ListUpdates.name: ListUpdates
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
ListUpdates.description:
Lists the updates for a given Amazon EKS cluster/nodegroup (in the specified or default
                                                region).

TagResource.name: TagResource
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes

UpdateClusterConfig.name: UpdateClusterConfig
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
UpdateClusterConfig.description: Update Amazon EKS cluster configurations (eg: API server endpoint access).

UpdateClusterVersion.name: UpdateClusterVersion
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
UpdateClusterVersion.description: Update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS cluster.

UpdateNodegroupConfig.name: UpdateNodegroupConfig
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
UpdateNodegroupConfig.description: Update Amazon EKS nodegroup configurations (eg: min/max/desired capacity or labels).

UpdateNodegroupVersion.name: UpdateNodegroupVersion
topics: Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes
UpdateNodegroupVersion.description: Update the Kubernetes version of an Amazon EKS nodegroup.
